page.title: 09FLAKEFLEET SCHOOL,FLEETWOOD
page.content: The school was built in 1939. It was originally for{35O pupils}but now there are{25O aged}between 7_11 years. There are 1O classes, 1O teachers, 1 headteacher and 1 part_timeteacher. The{pupil/teacher}ratio{25:1.}But classes are smaller in the younger classes and larger in the older classes. The uniform is encouraged but not compulsory. It is grey with grey or blue pullovers and school ties. The school dinners cost 51p a day. There is a choice of two dinners,or pupils can bring a packed lunch.The school clubs include sports,computer club, choir and popmobility.The headteacher, Mr. Derek Chappell's hopes for the future are: "to help each pupil to become a good person socially and educationally".
